bearerAuth.description: For accessing the API a valid JWT token must be passed in all the queries in the 'Authorization' header. A valid JWT token is generated by the API and retourned as answer of a call to the route /login giving a valid user & password. The following syntax must be used in the 'Authorization' header : x-access-token: xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz
bearerAuth.name: x-access-token
